Comment: The US Census department sends out annual census "requests" to businesses in all sorts of Industries. They do this to see economic and employment data in an industry. Add up a bunch of businesses in the same fields and you get an idea of tue whole. Ask year after year and you can develop trends.   This cuts deep into demographics of your workers, and break downs of your revenue. It's a lot of inside info.   The companies I have mentioned employee non-cis gendered folks, or have concerns due to industry info being leaked or compromised.
